title: Resources I find Useful
text:
Building your Personal Website
Quarto in R for local construction and Github Page for deployment

title: Kaixing Liu 刘开星
text:
Welcome to My Website!
I am currently a graduate student in the Department of Biostatistics at Vanderbilt University.


Education
MS in Biostatistics, 2023-2025, Vanderbilt University
BS in Biological Science (minor in Economics and Statistics), 2018-2023, Tsinghua University
High School, 2015-2018, The High School Attached to Hunan Normal Univeristy


Research Interest
Causal Inference: Instrumental Variable, G-Computation, and etc.
Data Integration/Fusion: Combine Randomized Clinical Trials and Observational Studies
Fundamental Problems of Statistics and Data Visualization

title: About
text: This website is intended for Academic Communication. I plan to write blogs to record my thoughts and understandings (technical/philosophical) in statistics, data science, mathematics, and etc. Feel free to email me if you have any question.
